SW_PARAM.Description: Animations, velocity and update rates are adjusted with ParamScale while this switch is activated.

Camera.Description: Used when player gets bounced off.

SW_A.Description: If used, it will remain passive until this switch gets activated.

SW_B.Description: If used, it will become passive after activating this switch.

Obj_arg0.Name: Ring Speed
Obj_arg0.Description: The rate at which the individual rings grow. Default is 20.

Obj_arg1.Name: Ring Duration
Obj_arg1.Description: The life time of an individual ring before it disappears. Default is 100.
